qt-any.configuration.title: Qt Any
qt-any.configuration.qtPath.description: Path to the Qt installation root directory (e.g., C:\Qt\6.5.0\mingw_64)

qt-any.command.createUiClass.title: Create UI Class

qt-any.configuration.showCreateProject.d: Show 'Create CMake Project' in context menu
qt-any.configuration.showEditTemplates.d: Show 'Edit Project Templates' in context menu (can be edited from the 'Edit Project Templates' command)
qt-any.configuration.showLocalConfig.des: Show 'Configure Local File Copying' in context menu (can be configured from the 'Configure Local File Copying' command)
